text: Dinoplax is a genus of chitons in the family Chaetopleuridae. They are marine molluscs. ==Taxonomy== Species in this genus include:http://www.marinespecies.org/aphia.php search term Dinoplax accessed 7 April 2010 * Dinoplax chelazziana (Ferreira, 1983) * Dinoplax fossus Sykes, 1899 * Dinoplax gigas (Gmelin, 1791) * Dinoplax validifossus Ashby, 1934 ==References== Category:Chaetopleuridae
title: Dinoplax
